summary: Diff updates global dark-mode styling tokens (Cyber‑Noir palette + glow utilities), modifies LandingPage to use new static hero background with a 60% black overlay and to show a logo in the header, and updates index.html to point to a new favicon path. However, the required image assets are not added in the diff, and there are unrequested additions (react-icons usage and URL/session param utilities).

missing_requirements.requirement: Primary CTA button text reads exactly “Book Now” and uses a purple→pink neon gradient styling; hero renders correctly on mobile/desktop without horizontal overflow.
missing_requirements.reason: The LandingPage.tsx diff is truncated before the primary CTA is shown; the provided snippet only shows a header “Get Started” button, and does not provide evidence of a hero CTA labeled exactly “Book Now” nor any evidence of overflow-safe responsive layout.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add required nightlife brand image assets as static files under frontend/public/assets/generated using the exact filenames requested.
missing_requirements.reason: No files were added in the diff (“ADDED FILES: none”), so the requested static image assets cannot be verified as present under frontend/public/assets/generated.

hallucinated_features.description: Introduced react-icons (SiFacebook/SiX/SiInstagram) despite the constraint to not add third-party icon packs beyond existing Lucide React usage.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest explicitly forbids adding third-party icon packs beyond Lucide React; the diff shows new imports from react-icons/si.

hallucinated_features.description: Expanded/added URL parameter + sessionStorage utilities (getPersistedUrlParameter, storeSessionParameter, etc.) unrelated to the landing hero/brand assets requirements.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest scope is landing page hero redesign + wiring static brand assets (logo + favicon). The diff includes substantial changes to urlParams utilities not requested in REQ-13/14/15.
